title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 46.5 - Evidence to be presented at hearing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 46.5 - Evidence to be presented at hearing

State Regulations

At the hearing, applicant shall be prepared to justify
the proposal and to show that the statements made in the petition are
true. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
46.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
